title: FO-05: E2E Testing
description:
Create and run E2E tests for FO-05

## Context

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-01-25-fo-05/2026-01-25-fo-05-spec.md

**Key files for this epic:**
- e2e/fo-04.test.ts - Reference E2E test to adapt
- docs/current/e2e-testing.md - Testing documentation

**Test scenarios:**
- Full flow from overview to affirmation
- Inspiration chip interaction (clicking shows 5 fragments)
- More Inspiration functionality (shows 8 more, then disappears)
- Sentence fragment appending behavior (with space separator)
- Continue typing button flow
- Info tab functionality
notes:
2026-01-24 08:32 - Key insight: FO-05 fragment input differs significantly from FO-04 chips - fragments append to textarea rather than toggling inline chips, and require 'Continue typing' click to enable Next button. Helper functions added: clickInspiration, clickFragment, clickContinueTyping, clickMoreInspiration, isMoreInspirationVisible, countFragmentChips, getInputValue
2026-01-24 08:36 - FO-05 E2E test passed without issues. Test validates: fragment input flow (Inspiration link, chip selection, Continue typing button, More Inspiration), dynamic AI screens (4 screens), affirmation generation/swiping, and full onboarding navigation.
